DOC.brief_summary: To determine feasibility process instrument overarch purpose guide design large study . To determine feasibility individual metastatic brain tumor ( ) engage physical activity ( PA ) cognitive rehabilitation ( CR ) outpatient therapy setting .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Cognitive Rehab & Physical Activity Exec Functioning Following Radiation Therapy ( RT ) Cerebral Mets
DOC.detailed_description: Rolling recruitment study . Participants randomize one three treatment arm . All treatment arm undergo physical & cognitive testing prior whole-brain radiation therapy ( WBRT ) /stereotactic radiosurgery ( SRS ) . Arm 3 receive cognitive rehabilitation intervention session prior , concurrent , WBRT/SRS . Approximately 14 day follow WBRT/SRS : arm undergo physical cognitive testing , : Arm 1 begin physical activity intervention . Arm 2 begin physical activity intervention cognitive intervention . Arm 3 continue cognitive intervention begin physical activity intervention . All Arms undergo physical cognitive test approximately 2.5 month post WBRT/SRS .
DOC.criteria: A potential subject must meet follow inclusion criterion eligible participate study : Ability understand willingness provide write informed consent 18 year age old Diagnosed one metastatic brain tumor ( ) Medical treatment plan include wholebrain radiation therapy / sterotactic radiosurgery A potential subject meet follow exclusion criterion ineligible participate study . Diagnosis dementia unable grant inform consent Prisoner patient custody Patient psychiatric hold Physically unable participate study The opinion treat physician determines medically safe participate study Preregistration screen cognition `` severe '' low .
